channel.title: Welcome on Robert Schnitman
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Robert Schnitman

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Hello, my name is Robert Schnitman, and welcome to my site! This site describes myself and the services I provide as an independent contractor, as well as a blog to record data analysis and R programming ideas. Please check out the “About”, “Curriculum Vitae”, and “Services” pages for more information! Thank you for your time!
